text: Nguazimɨn atriviba arazir mɨzɨrɨzir bar kurar avɨriba amizir kam ko dagh ami. Ezɨ nguazimɨn gumazamiziba uaghan a ko arazir bar mɨzɨrɨzibagh amua, egha gumazim wainɨn avɨrim amezɨ moghɨn ongani.”(17:2) Gumazamiziba arazir bar mɨzɨrɨzibagh amir arazir kamɨn akam, a gumazir God ataghizir arazimɨn ababanim, egha Godɨn ifavariba ko arazir kurar igharazibar gɨn zui. Egha Godɨn damazimɨn, a mati gumazim uabɨ uan amuim ategha, ghua gumazamiziba uari isava akua amir arazim gami.
